creator: forevertraveller@hotmail.com
text:
During converting the fo file to pdf file , all seem to be ok. Although there 
are some errors and warnings, all are about unimplemented property. Then I 
open the pdf, and the Reader told me that an unrecognized token'NaN' was found 
when opening pdf file . But the file is still be opened with the exception of 
that the first page is blank.

The strcuture of the fo file is very simple, only a table. It has a header, 
footer and body. Under the header and footer, there is only one row. But there 
are over more than 2000 rows enclosed in the table body.

Sounds like a division by zero somewhere or something like that. Please attach 
a sample XSL-FO file that shows this problem so we can reproduce it.
creator: jeremias@apache.org

text: I had a similar problem: Adobe´s Reader cannot cope with text with a size of 0, whereas other Readers like FoxitReader can. Changed the color of the text to white and it worked well even with Adobe. Maybe this helps you?
creator: thomas.winnebald@getit.de

text: resetting P2 open bugs to P3 pending further review
creator: gadams@apache.org
